content.detailedDescription:
Near las vegas, for several days i noticed what looked like a second sun. last day that i watched this, there was a different pattern. the big ball of light had a very dark square in the middle, so i took five pictures in sequence. i was shocked on the picture that showed a round shape above it that had a perfect shapes of a diamond pattern that was pink in color with a bright white light in the center and a white light shooting out of that. i could only see the bright ball of light visually with a black square in the middle, but the camera showed so much more.  it illuminated the sky, so i thought i would hear something on the news, nothing. no one else seemed to notice. i looked up the two sun appearance online, other areas did notice this, but they didn't get pictures like mine.  the lights seemed to be parallel with the sun going down, but the last day i saw it, it was different.  i still can't get over what i saw and i haven't seen anything like it since.

i tried to attach photos, but the buttons below won't open???
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Chevron,   Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: Bright light with dark square in middle. picture shows pattern & light shooting from ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was sent the picture and i noticed it in the background. there is a second one below the more prominent one which is quite difficult to spot. just wondered if you could help.
content.summary: Appeared in background of photograph

content.detailedDescription: While travling north on florida state route 85,5 about 3 to 5 miles north of campton,fl., me and my wife saw a unknown object with 3 large diamon shape (silver/white lighs with slight yellow mist around unknown object).Then we saw a second unknown object just like the first one past right in front from 5 to 10 seconds later going in the same direction----east to west.  i look over to the west both unknown objects disappeared.  i saw no other aircraft in the area at this time,i have seen anything like this before!!!!
content.summary: Both objests had 3 large diamond shaped silver/white lights

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i had gone camping near the end of july in 2003, jemez falls camp ground in jemez mountains, new mexico. it was becoming very late and my friends girlfriend had asked me if i would walk her to the restroom that were several yards away and in the dark, away from the camp fire.  the sky was extremely clear with no moon if there was a moon it was not visible. when we began to walk back to the camp area and in a meadow  both her and i were admiring the milky way galaxy. living in the city of albuquerque we are unable to see stars, planets and the illuminated sky in such detail.  we than noticed what appeared to be a falling star going in a north east direction. the light was very bright and had a small blue trail. my friends girlfriend and i awed at the event and i began to make a wish and stated " i wish...." but before i could finish my sentence the light stopped near to end of the visible sky from the tree line in our view which would have been at about 20 degrees from the horizon. the light did not stop for long but immediately changed direction towards the west. we had both watched in disappear into the west horizon. the light was extremely fast, too fast for any air craft i have ever seen. her and i both agreed the light had covered the visible sky in distance in seconds. the light, we had agreed was very star like but slightly brighter and with a small blue trail. when we returned to the camp area my best friend, her boyfriend and another friend had agreed to have seen a falling star like light going into the west horizon but they did not see the directional change or when the star like light was coming from the south west direction
content.summary: Falling star like craft seen in jemez falls camp ground in jemez mountains

content.detailedDescription: For the past month and a half, maybe two months i and my family have been watching strange lights that will appear out of nowhere. one is larger than the rest.(there are smaller lights that travel with it). very bright like a star. it seems like it's cloaked and when it appears that's when it moves. each time i've seen this it has been at different altitudes. for two weeks they were traveling south to southwest now they are traveling north to northwest. they do not pulsate or blink just a steady very bright glow.-it is the end of july and i am still watching these lights but at much higher altitude. i watch these travel higher up to a point where i cannot see them any longer. there is no sound.
content.summary: I have been watching strange lights for the past month and a half. these lights will suddenly appear out of no where, and at this time the light appears very bright and does not pulsate or blink it has a very bright white light, no sounds.

content.detailedDescription: We had stopped home to pick up a laptop i was working on for a bartender. as i got back in the car, and turned west, we saw what looked like a hot air balloon on fire. there was fire, and the object was oscillating right-to-left. it came straight at us, then vectored sharply without banking to the northeast. stopped and ascended, disappearing completely. whole thing took about 45 seconds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Oscillating orange light. came straight at us from the west. vectored and ascended.

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was about 14 or 15 yrs old there were 3 of us sleeping outside after riding our horses and we camped out in my freinds grandma's house we were looking up and one was talking all sudden this huge. glowing light came over the treetops slow and you could not even hear a cricket no sound at all we all looked at each other then when we looked back up it was gone and we all ran into house never spoke about it ever again i don't remember anything after seeing it we just went on and now i'm 50 yrs old but i know what i saw was not from this earth no way. completely silent and perfect circle glowing
content.summary: It was big round glowing hovering above treetops nigeria than football field and 100 yards in sky made no noise did not see it exit was gone in seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in a parking lot about noon.I looked up about 80 degrees above the ground and seen an object that was sitting stationary in the sky.There was very few clouds that day and it was windy.I was trying to go shoping for food and showed it to a few people standing out side.We were all looking at it and i could not stand out there anymore.So i went in the store and shopped for about 30 minuets.When i came out it was gone and so was everyone looking at it.I could not believe that this thing was not moving being that high up.It seemed that it was turning slowly.Thats what reminded me of what i seen on tv once about u.F.O sightings.I think it was a place on the beach in florida.It seemed like it was the same exact thing.I drew a picture of what i seen when i got back.It looked like it was turning back and forth like the one in florida.It definitely was there cause there were about four other people that seen it when i pointed it out.It also looked to be a very little bit of shimmering around the eges.Very weird for something that early in the day.
content.summary: This looked almost exactly like a u.F.O reported in florida i seen on tv.It was there for at least 30 minuets.

content.detailedDescription: I work for a locksmith so i was on call. i left my fathers house at 12:15am, to take the call, as i went out the front door i looked up and saw lights flying in formation. i screamed for my dad to come outside and take a look. he came outside and also saw them. there were about 30 lights flying in formation from north to south about 10,000 feet in altitude. they made absolutely no noise and flew from north to south. the incident was about 5 mins in length as they weren't going very fast. the final 6 of the group flew in a triangle formation. i snapped a picture with my phone and my father called the cops to report it. my father and i were in awe, and i was reluctant to report the incident. however my father insisted.
content.summary: About 30 lights flew over head from north to south, they were glowing orange and made no noise.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
A friend and myself were taking a smoke break during a show. we stepped out back. i looked up over the tree to the north and i noticed this ball or orb-like thing in the air coming at us ( or it seemed to ). it was an orangey-red color. my friend looked up and saw it as well. we stood there watching this object. it flew in a direct path then stopped, blinked, and changed direction. when it changed its path it also changed its shape. it was no longer red and orange, but now it was a glowing off white color. it also was projecting a beam from it as well. the beam is what caught my friend and i so off guard. the reason i say this is because: if you are driving in a vehicle of any sort, the beginning of the beam is typically the narrowest while the farthest edge of the beam tends to be wider and less powerful. that was not the case with the object in the sky. eminating from the object the beam was widest with more distortion in it. the farther the beam was from the object the more of a fine point that it came to. this last for about 20 minutes. the object began to move behind some trees that were approx. 300-400ft away from us. we began to run to see if we could see it from the other side of the trees. the object simply vanished. we felt in awe as we were watching this. after we felt dumbfounded. as we made our way back up to the venue, we went inside and told everyone what we had seen. some listened with interest others thought we were nuts. 

if you would like a drawing or something i can make it. this image is something that i will not forget.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating orb to triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: While driving home to pella from des moines, my wife pointed out an orange orb in the sky far away. after pointing out to her it was a possible ufo we pulled to the side of the road. we realized there were five flying in a straight line. when one would fade away another would appear at the back of the line.  i realized they were flying in a circular pattern.
content.summary: Orange orb flying in apparent circular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
1:  on july 27, 2013, saturday evening at approximately 9:10 pm, my adult daughter and i were walking our dogs on mineral spring ave going west and turning at power road going north.  we walked two blocks to the corner of power road and atwood street in pawtucket, ri 02860

2:  my daughter looked to the east down atwood street and noticed an object in the sky and yelled, ���hey, what's that in the sky���!  i walked a couple of feet, past a tree that was blocking my view and i witnessed a lighted object towards the end of atwood street, a street that is approximately only 1/10th of a mile long and in a residential neighborhood.

3:  from the moment i witnessed the object, it was without a doubt that i was looking at a flying saucer.

4:  the object was low to the ground and very viable with red/orange pulsating lights around the circumference of the craft.  because of the lights it was unclear if there was any circular motion or if it was just hovering  at a height above the electrical lines and about tree height.  it would have taken an approximate 20' above ground round pool to cover the circumference of the craft.  it was not behind any object or even behind a cloud and it was a clear night. 

5:  my feelings was that of extreme excitement which took over my emotions, but at the same time i was in fear of the unknown.  i was in awe, overwhelmed and confused, but knowing i did not have a camera or cell phone i knew i would not be able to document anything.  if i would have had clear thinking i would have knocked on someone's door, but this experience was overwhelming and i just could not focus.  i asked my daughter to run home with my sister's dog that she was walking and get my sister, a camera and a phone.  i stayed on power road when i spotted a teenaged boy walking towards me.  i ran to him and asked him to walk down the street with me. i told he he was about to see a flying saucer, something not too many people would ever witness in  a lifetime.  i don't know why, but i walked half way down the street and decided to turn around run home to meet up with my sister, daughter and to get my car.  my dog who is friendly and obedient decided that he did not want to walk or follow me.  he was wearing a pinch collar and it was even hard for me to force him to leave and i had to literally drag him to get him to walk with me.  i had never seen him so defiant and it wasn't until we were half way home before he walked as he normally would.   
when i reached my house, my newly acquired tenant was on the porch looking south, in the opposite direction of where i witnessed the saucer.   i asked him if he noticed anything unusual in the sky, he said that he did not but that he did see a balloon in the sky earlier that day. 
1:  on july 27, 2013, saturday evening at approximately 9:10 pm, my adult daughter and i were walking our dogs on mineral spring ave going west and turning at power road going north.  we walked two blocks to the corner of power road and atwood street in pawtucket, ri 02860

2:  my daughter looked to the east down atwood street and noticed an object in the sky and yelled, ���hey, what's that in the sky���!  i walked a couple of feet, past a tree that was blocking my view and i witnessed a lighted object towards the end of atwood street, a street that is approximately only 1/10th of a mile long and in a residential neighborhood.

3:  from the moment i witnessed the object, it was without a doubt that i was looking at a flying saucer.

4:  the object was low to the ground and very visible with red/orange pulsating lights around the circumference of the craft.  because of the lights it was unclear if there was any circular motion or if it was just hovering  at a height above the electrical lines and at about tree height.  it would have taken an approximate 20' above ground round pool to cover the circumference of the craft.  it was not behind any objects or even behind any clouds.....It was a clear night. 

5:  my feelings was that of extreme excitement which took over my emotions, but at the same time i was in fear of the unknown.  i was in awe, overwhelmed and confused, but knowing i did not have a camera or cell phone i knew i would not be able to document anything.  if i would have had clear thinking i would have knocked on someone's door, but this experience was overwhelming and i just could not focus.  i asked my daughter to run home with my sister's dog that she was walking and get my sister, a camera and a phone.  i stayed on power road when i spotted a teenaged boy walking towards me.  i ran to him and asked him to walk down the street with me. i told he he was about to see a flying saucer, something not too many people would ever witness in  a lifetime.  i don't know why, but i walked half way down the street and decided to turn around run home to meet up with my sister, daughter and to get my car.  my dog who is friendly and obedient decided that he did not want to walk or follow me.  he was wearing a pinch collar and it was even hard for me to force him to leave and i had to literally drag him to get him to walk with me.  i had never seen him so defiant and it wasn't until we were half way home before he walked without me having to pull him.  
 
when i reached my house, my newly acquired tenant was on the porch looking south, in the opposite direction of where i witnessed the saucer.   i asked him if he noticed anything unusual in the sky, he said that he did not but that he did see a balloon in the sky earlier that day, which i'm assuming was a blimp.

6.My daughter, my sister and i drove back with my car that is equipped with on star.  i thought that if i needed to document my exact location on star would be capable of following the path that my car would be traveling.  however, when i returned to the same spot there was no sign of the saucer.  there was however a lighted object in the sky traveling west on the opposite side of power road.  i tried to follow and it and it disappeared within seconds of my noticing it.  we drove around for a while as i tried to place a call to the news station, to see if anyone had reported seeing anything in the area and my call could not be completed.
  
i am hoping that by posting this information that i will be able to be in contact with anyone from my area that might have witnessed the same thing that me and my daughter witnessed.  i am extremely sad that i could not document this experience other than with a photograph and a drawing, but i am thankful that i am safe, unharmed and now not skeptical of anyone who can describe an experience that most of us would never believe.  

photos:

1)  picture shows street which  is approximately 1/10 of a mile long with  tree blocking entire view of the street

2)  pictures shows just past the tree with the remainder of the street view

3)  picture shows the street with no obstruction

4)  picture shows a drawing of the flying saucer at the location of what was visible to me and at the approximate location, size and height. 
6.My daughter, my sister and i drove back with my car that is equipped with on star.  i thought that if i needed to document my exact location on star would be capable of following the path that my car would be traveling.  however, when i returned to the same spot there was no sign of the saucer.  there was however a lighted object in the sky traveling west on the opposite side of power road.  i tried to follow and it and it disappeared within seconds of my noticing it.  we drove around for a while as i tried to place a call to the news station, to see if anyone had reported seeing anything in the area and my call could not be completed.
  
i am hoping that by posting this information that i will be able to be in contact with anyone from my area that might have witnessed the same thing that me and my daughter witnessed.  i am extremely sad that i could not document this experience other than with a photograph and a drawing, but i am thankful that i am safe, unharmed and now not skeptical of anyone who can describe an experience that most of us would never believe.  

photos:

1)  picture shows street which  is approximately 1/10 of a mile long with  tree blocking entire view of the street

2)  pictures shows just past the tree with the remainder of the street view

3)  picture shows the street with no obstruction

4)  picture shows a drawing of the flying saucer at the location of what was visible to me and at the approximate location, size and height.
content.summary: This was an identifiable flying saucer.  the craft was hovering at tree line level, was approx. 20' round/oval with red/orange pulsating lights around the circumference.

content.detailedDescription:
I wake up in the middle of the night in my bed to find that my girlfriend isnt there. i dont think much of it maybe she went to the bathroom. i roll over and see out my large window in my bedroom and see a glowing light outside. i thought it was just my dads dusk/dawn light on his garage so i get up to close the blinds. when i look out the window i see a large glowing craft hovering by his garage it emitted a very bright white light. it was so bright that the trees it was behind didnt have a shadows. the trees were probably 15-20ft tall. this is when i notice it got brighter underneath it and a person (something)standing under it, then the craft started to pulsate. the being started to move closer to my window but when it moved it wasnt like it walked it was more like it teleported. it would disappear and reappear in another spot closer to me. for a spilt second it just disappeared i thought it had left. thats when it raised up from outside my window face to face with me. it was a grey, almond shaped head and big black eyes. i thought to myself this has to be a dream, i need to wake up now but i couldnt. so i told myself i need to try to scream to wake myself up, i managed to let out a scream. this is when i "wake up" i was laying in my bed i jolted myself out of bed when i woke and let out a gasp. i see my girlfriend laying next to me in bed asleep, i roll over to put my arm around her thinking it was all just a dream. thats when i see a shadowy figure of a grey stand in the corner but it was very tall. taller then the door frame it was standing next to and it was kind of hunched over. i was scared to death almost paralyzed in fear. i just put my head down next to my girlfriend and try to go back to sleep.  

ive always thought this was a dream but it doesnt really feel like a dream. the experience of it feels like an actual life event.  my girlfriend has no memory of something like this happening for the time that i didnt see her. this happend around the spring of 2003 and i havent told many people about this up until recently.
content.summary: Dreamlike abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down colorado blvd going back to my sisters house when out of the corner of my eye i saw something with lights hovering above the church on 38th. i did a u-turn on 40th and turned on 38th then stopped. i recorded it on my sisters cell phone. while recording i noticed that the object was not showing up on the screen even though i was looking right at it. i then stopped a guy that was walking and asked him if he saw it. he said "ya you mean that square thing with the lights, it looks like a kite" it was not a kite. it was 2:30am. i then left and drove the short distance to my sisters. i told her about it. when i told her it was still there when i left she wanted to go see if it was still there. we drove back to that area and it was there hovering above the church. we stopped on 38th and sat there bewildered as to what this object was. my sister told me to drive under it. 02apprehensively i decided to drive down the alley just after the parking lot of the church. as we maneuvered south down the alley the object hovered above but even with the car as it moved. when we reached 37th i turned left and stopped. the object was hovering over 37th. as we were stopped a truck passed us and pulled over to see what we were looking at. they saw the object and thought it was peculiar. they went about their business. my sister was trying to photograph the object (which we both concluded looked like a red transparent bubble with bluish white lights that seemed to be eyes.)  when the flash went off the object hovered/floated behind some trees as if it were trying to hide. i backed up down the street so we could see it. i then decided to see if it would "follow" us and drove back up the street and it did indeed stay in close proximity to the car. we parked in the church parking lot and got out. it was not threatening in anyway, just odd. the two guys in the truck drove back by, saw us still looking and pulled into the parking lot. the four of us could not determine what it was. it did somewhat resemble a balloon so one of the guys tried to locate where a string was that would be tethering the object and was unsuccessful. meanwhile my sister called her boyfriend and he showed up. he too was baffled as to what this floating/hovering object could be. the two guys in the truck left and my sister, her boyfriend and i just watched. it seemed to be looking at us with the lights. the lights moved as if it were thinking or computing. i'm not sure of the correct word... it had intelligence. by the time we left it was 4:00am and the object never went out of sight. we left it, it didn't disappear. during this time we also saw 2 what seemed to be stars go from standstill to across the sky. it was like they took it out of park and moved quickly across the entire sky.

the pictures i provided aside from the original ( the black background with white lights) are different filters i tried using a photo editor.
content.summary: I saw a red balloon/bubble type object with bluish white lights. it certainly had some sort of intelligence.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the front yard smoking a cigarette and looking at the stars my sister in law came out and noticed something blinking and moving she pointed it out and i clwarly saw starlike but larger object moving randomly and changing direction then stopping and moving again blinking red white blue green. it would get brighter as it moved and faded when it stopped. we watched it for 30 minutes before going inside. i saw this object before exactly in albuquerque new mexico and i had a witness with me then also in fact i called that witness as i watched this recent one and told her she was amazed. i also reported that previous sigjting to mufon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing blinking light moving radomly changing directions then stopping then moving again

content.detailedDescription: I was at my parents house in wellston michigan taking a walk out back. i stopped next to my dads trailer to relieve myself when i looked up and seen a cigar shaped white obkect with three porthole windows in it. it hovered a few hundred feet adove the trees and then moved towards the south. it made no noise at all. i was shocked! i tryed getting my brothers attention but he must have been in the house. whole sighting only lasted 1 to 2 minutes.
content.summary: Saw a cigar shaped object with three windows above the tree line

content.detailedDescription:
This information and sighting is on behalf of my father who witnessed the event while star gazing. i was personally sitting in my home reading when i heard a helicopter pass over my home. as it did, everything in my home vibrated sightly from it passing by. it was unusually low. there have been helicopters passing over our house before but never so low that they made our home slightly tremble as it was happening. 
my father is what most would consider to be an extremely high level recreational astronomer who has been studying the sky for most of his life. every night stars are out, he is taking photos or testing equipment. 
shortly after the helicopter i noticed the helicopter passing, he came inside very perplexed and somewhat excited by what had transpired only moments ago at approximately 10:30pm.
he claimed to have seen a large gold tinted glowing orb flying below the cloud line making no noise or leaving any particle trails. approximately 900-1,000' behind it some sort of helicopter was either following or chasing it. the details on what type of helicopter it was are currently unknown to me at this point but he was certain that either this orb was leading the helicopter somewhere or it was being chased by said helicopter. he noted that the tilt of the fuselage of the helicopter was slightly more than he had seen before and also stated the speed of the helicopter was most likely near its maximum. there was still close to 900' between the two objects as they were headed in a straight line in the northern direction with no change noted. he lost sight of the object as it passed by and accumulated distance and naturally fell out of sight with the helicopter behind it.
content.summary: This is on behalf of my father, an astronomer who witnessed this. he saw this glowing, golden/orange orb being chased or followed by a helicopter last night.

content.detailedDescription: I had noticed the sky had turned a very dark grey and wished to take a photograph of this with my iphone. i took several photographs of the sky all around my home to show my family how dark the sky had become in quite a short period of time. i had initially forgotten about the photographs until several days later when i was deleting some other photographs from my iphone. i looked at the photographs of the sky and since my family had also observed the sky elsewhere, it was unecessary to show them the images. i deleted a total of 3 but when i saw the 4th and final photograph i saw something odd near the middle-left of the image. i had not noticed this in the sky at the time of taking the photographs. i am unable to explain what happened during the actual time the object was in the sky as i did not see it. after seeing the image on my iphone i was surprised that something very obvious had escaped my attention and could not understand how i did not see the object when taking the photograph. i lost sight of the image when it passed several houses.
content.summary: Very reflective object sighted above house

content.detailedDescription: During a family get together we all were star gazing out on the lawn and just talking among ourselves when my uncle pointed out a huge bright light looked like car's high beams got flashed and it started out small and dim than that's when we all noticed how bright the ball of light got and it lasted about 10 seconds or so than it zig-zaged and suddenly the huge ball of light just vanished and faded out. after a few moments we all looked at each other in amusement and wondered if we were crazy or if we had mistaken it for another satellite we tried to focus on it after it faded out but there was no sight of it after that we witnessed several balls of light but this time they just blinked in and out and were gone in an instant not like the first time we had seen the very first one.
content.summary: Was star gazing with family and members pointed out a bright white flash that was heading north it was huge like a headlight flash than turned a different direction and was gone

content.detailedDescription: My son, in from out of town, and i were sightseeing and enjoying driving with the ac off and the windows down.  we were cutting across from lamar just south of lake lady bird johnson going east on riverside when my son exclaimed "what is that?"  i looked straight ahead and saw a luminescent starlike orb that was obviously too large for a star.  it was changing colors from yellow-orange to red.  there was a police car ahead at the intersection of riverside and lee barton drive.  i told my son to pull over asap so we turned right and parked on the curb on the west side of lee barton drive.  i jumped out and took a still photo.  i continued to video what now appeared to be two lights/orbs changing colors and pulsating in unison.  i ran out of memory on my phone so i frantically began erasing apps and data to get enough room for more video.  in the meantime, my son passed 8 persons on an outdoor patio at a bar restaurant.  they yelled to him asking what we were doing.  my son called their attention to the objects at which point numerous persons began observing the lights as well.  i took three segment of video.  we then lost them in the cloud cover and as one dropped below the visible horizon behind some trees.  we were very nervous and excited which caused me to make errors when trying to video.  because of the light pollution, i was unable to see the objects on my phone display while videoing which caused the objects to be out of frame from time to time.  we then attempted to move to locations more easterly and at higher elevations in an attempt to regain sight of the anomalous lights/objects but were unsuccessful.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbs observed east of location.  path irregular.  movement in and out of low clouds.  one to three observed winking in and out, pulsating and changing colors but predominantly red to red orange.  have phone video of portions of sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to look out of a window in my home and saw a unusual large light sitting above the mountains, approximately 30 miles across the san luis valley from my living space in crestone , co. on july 29, 2013. i grabbed a 10x50 bushnell binocular and saw pulsating red / orange colors for approx. 25 minutes after which it faded away in a matter of seconds.
the above happened between 9 and 10 pm
same thing happened on july 30th, at 9:30pm
i thought the light was a planet until it disappeared in a clear sky.
the object stayed in the same place the entire time i was able to observe it, being so far away i could only see the colors and the pulsating of.
content.summary: Viewed large object 30 miles across san luis valley in same spot 2 nights in a row just above the mountains

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were leaving the amc movie theatre on july 29, 2013 at 10:20 on the far southside of indianapolis when we noticed a very bright orange light north of us - just over downtown at 45 degrees. at first i thought it was a planet - a very bright star. we both are very familiar with aircraft (my husband works at the airport) and watched to see what it was - it didn't appear to be anything we had seen in the past.  the orange light flickered like candle light within a circle. it almost looked like a chinese lantern, and thought maybe it was, until a commercial jet liner flying into indianapolis international airport flew underneath it. we knew then that this thing was bigger than an airliner. it made no noise and had a trajectory and was flying south south-east. we continued to watch it fly directly over us. as it flew overhead, it was a round shape (pie plate bottom) and no longer orange but a light grey in color. the wind was out of the se that night but this thing was heading into the wind.
content.summary: Orange light as bright as a star over downtown indianapolis. the orange color flickered like candle light. it flew over a landing airliner. overhead it appeared as a soft grey circle.  it was huge.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were standing outside on our balcony. we witnessed an object which at first appeared to be a star very low in the sky, just above the treetops in the distance. we watched the light/object for around 5 minutes. the object appeared to be flickering and flashing slightly. we first noticed the object because we thought it was unusual to see a star that low in the sky and have had previous experiences seeing strange objects in the sky line while out on our balcony. after watching the object for a few minutes, we felt a little uneasy and decided to go back inside. i suggested to my brother that we use our telescope to look at the object with a better view. my brother got the telescope and went back onto the balcony. when he got back to the balcony, which was probably around 3 minutes later, the object was noticeably lower in the sky, closer to the treeline than it had been before. he set up the telescope and tried to focus on the star-like object. he got a decent unfocused glimpse of the object for around 10 seconds and noticed flashing lights and changing colors within the object. he stated that the object almost seemed organic. he watched the object slowly descend and straddle the treeline for a few seconds. it then dipped below the treeline and stayed there for a few seconds, before popping back up for another few seconds. it then slowly descended beneath the treeline and did not come back up.
content.summary: Object appeared to be a star low in the sky. flickered for a few minutes then slowly descended below the trees, ascended back up for a few seconds, then descended back below tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, july 7, 2013, i was photographing both of my sons playing in the ocean at huntington beach, california.  the time was approximately noon and we were located on the left side of the pier.  i took several photographs and did not notice anything in the sky or in the camera lens that seemed out of sorts.  approximately two hours later, we had moved to the north side of the pier (right side) and i again took several photographs.  again, nothing appeared out of the normal.

once home, i began the task of reviewing our photographs and noticed that on two (out of dozens) there appears to be a oval, round shaped black object hovering in the sky.  it appears closer in one shot and farther out in the second.  

i cannot explain these objects.  some plausible explanations have been kite surfers, but no surfers appear in the shots and we did not notice any kite surfers at the time.  there are reflections on the object that match the direction of the light.  i took several shots in sequence at this area, and these are the only two that they appear in.  which, by my estimates, would somehow put the object in view for less than an eighth of a second.
content.summary: Object captured on film above ocean, not seen with human eye

content.detailedDescription: Well my father was traveling to eagle pass texas when he and his wife saw something very shiny in the sky hovering and was puzzled what it could be and that's when he told his wife to take a picture with his phone....And that's when he came home and showed me i sent it in a txt message to my phone and zoomed in and showed him and he was shocked to see that it showed a disc shape and he said when he saw it when he was driving it look like a shiny orb like balloon shape ....And as i look at it i am baffled to what it is cause i haven't seen anything like it...
content.summary: Was driving and sight seeing notice something hovering looking like a round shiny object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Well my father was traveling to eagle pass texas when he and his wife saw something very shiny in the sky hovering and was puzzled what it could be and that's when he told his wife to take a picture with his phone....And that's when he came home and showed me i sent it in a txt message to my phone and zoomed in and showed him and he was shocked to see that it showed a disc shape and he said when he saw it when he was driving it look like a shiny orb like balloon shape ....And as i look at it i am baffled to what it is cause i haven't seen anything like it...
content.summary: Was driving and sight seeing notice something hovering looking like a round shiny object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
its about 11:30 p.M. while watching a very active thunderstorm a abnormally bright circular light broke out from the heavey storm clouds
 it travelled quite quickly in a straightline at a speed i am not familiuar with.. its was way faster than the jets i have seen but slower than a meteor. no noise no trail well defined bright it was moving in a straight sw direction and quickly disappeared into the blackness .
 i stood there wondering what i had just seen, i at that point attributed it to some kind of a slow freak lighting event, like ball lightning or something. so i sat back and continued to watch the storm. about two to three minutes later the light returned from the s.W. as best as i could tell along what looked to be the exact same line it had left on. this time it seemed to be travelling faster and disappeared back into the storm clouds. i dont think that lighting goes that way so it kinda squashed my rational explaination. i watched the storm come in and leave but never saw the mystery light again. i not being a 100% believer in ufo am lost for a rational explaination  the next day i explained to my wife and buddy what i had seen and while they were quick with "answers" i just agreed and moved on knowing full well none of thier answers were even remotley close to what i saw.
  i am at this point still looking for answers it feels lke a mission
content.summary: Visual encounter extra bright white light moving about a lightening storm

content.detailedDescription: This has happenedeveryday for the past couple weeks, though lthis time was most intense.Started taking pics like i did in la a few days ago (video posted under scene differently) and until i blew up a still shot i didm't realize the bright "star"was not just an orb but the exhaust from some engine for a much huger ship. tonight i was taking pics and suddenly 9 or 10 small "ships"emerged after the initial one spotted me. so maybe it was just a bunch of small ones. lastly,saw a red octagonal (+) 2d ball roll down the coastline. sounds crazy. but three days of shooting, haven't even analyzed most pics, looks pretty f*in real, whatever it is, however it stealths...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Chevron,   Cross,   Diamond,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Unknown
content.summary: Large football field size spacecraft, multiples

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a campfire with 2 other people the other woman first said what is that her son said the same and pointed at the object i looked up saw this glowing cilinder, it appeared to be moving slowly east to west iwe realized that wind was moving west to east by this time my husband and another man were watching and commenting on its direction and speed and shape etc it seemed to hover and change ejection to north, we watched it until it went of site
content.summary: 5 people all adults observed obect as it passed by us we all observed it moving against the wind and then hover and change diection

content.detailedDescription:
As called in to asd on 7/29/13: 

the witness said that he saw a v formation of six orange/yellow lights moving from east to west, and a second diamond formation behind it with four light. the diamond formation sped up and over took the v formation.  the witness stated that he thought these objects were traveling at 200-300 mph or more when they both stopped for several seconds, then continued on. these two formations of lights appeared to be part of two single crafts because the lights never changed position, even as one tilted upwards the lights remained in position. it was dark and he could not see the outline of a craft, however. more individual lights, moving at different rates of speed in a straight line followed.  the witness counted 30 lights total.  then some of the individual lights moved faster and overtook those in front.  all of the objects then moved very quickly up and through a single opening in the clouds and disappeared from view behind the clouds. the witness called the police, who referred him to the faa, who said they do not take reports such as this.  the witness has seen sky lanterns and said that these did not behave in the same manner.  the witness is an aircraft engineer and wishes to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Huge ufos flying low over the city, one triangle, one diamond, and single lights following
